attributes.action: Stop councils wasting our money on art
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need councils to stop wasting money on pieces of art to go in the middle of roundabouts and town centres and spend money on better facilities and road repairs,a statue on a roundabout on the A421 near bedford reportedly cost £1 million and they have just put one in the town centre aswell
